content.question: Quaternary economic activities are those that

choices.label: extract natural resources from the environment
transform raw materials into finished products
involve the collection, processing, and manipulation of information
involve the exchange of goods and the provision of services
involve the production of fresh produce for urban markets

content.answer: involve the collection, processing, and manipulation of information

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
